entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Western Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Western Head 04:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: NE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this morning. Showers beginning this morning. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 this afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to periods of snow this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
